title: Toast Peppercorns
description: Toast black peppercorns in a pan over medium-low heat until fragrant, ensuring they are moved around for even toasting.

original_subgoals.title: Toast Peppercorns
original_subgoals.description: Toast black peppercorns in a pan over medium-low heat until fragrant, ensuring they are moved around for even toasting.

title: Prepare Ingredients
description: Gather and prepare all necessary ingredients for making pasta carbonara, including guanciale or bacon, pecorino romano, eggs, pasta, black pepper, and optional garlic. Grate the cheeses finely using a cheese grater or box grater. Bring eggs to room temperature and separate yolks from whites to prepare for mixing with cheese.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare Ingredients
original_subgoals.description: Gather all necessary ingredients within arm's reach to ensure a smooth cooking process without delays.

original_subgoals.title: Grate Cheese
original_subgoals.description: Grate Parmesan and Pecorino cheeses finely using a microplane for a smooth sauce texture.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare Eggs
original_subgoals.description: Bring eggs to room temperature and separate yolks from whites to prepare for mixing with cheese.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare Ingredients
original_subgoals.description: Gather and prepare all necessary ingredients for making pasta carbonara, including guanciale, pecorino romano, eggs, pasta, black pepper, and optional garlic.

original_subgoals.title: Grate Cheese
original_subgoals.description: Grate Pecorino Romano and Parmigiano Reggiano cheeses finely, using a cheese grater or box grater.

original_subgoals.title: Grate cheese
original_subgoals.description: Grate the cheese to prepare it for mixing with the egg yolks.

title: Crush Peppercorns
description: Crush the toasted peppercorns using a pan or grinder to achieve a coarse texture.

original_subgoals.title: Crush Peppercorns
original_subgoals.description: Crush the toasted peppercorns using a pan or grinder to achieve a coarse texture.

title: Prepare Egg Mixture
description: Crack eggs into a bowl and mix with pecorino cheese to create the egg mixture for the carbonara sauce. Optionally, separate the egg yolks from the whites and mix whole eggs and egg yolks, whisking them together with the grated cheese to form a smooth mixture. Optionally, add some pasta water to create the sauce. Add some crushed peppercorns for flavor.

original_subgoals.title: Mix Eggs and Cheese
original_subgoals.description: Combine grated cheese with eggs to form a smooth, creamy mixture, adding some crushed peppercorns for flavor.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare egg mixture
original_subgoals.description: Beat eggs with parmesan, pecorino, and pepper for the sauce.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare Egg Mixture
original_subgoals.description: Crack eggs into a bowl and mix with pecorino cheese to create the egg mixture for the carbonara sauce.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare Egg Mixture
original_subgoals.description: Mix whole eggs and egg yolks, whisk them together, and incorporate the grated cheese to form a smooth mixture.

original_subgoals.title: Separate egg yolks
original_subgoals.description: Separate the egg yolks from the whites to use in the sauce.

original_subgoals.title: Mix sauce ingredients
original_subgoals.description: Combine the grated cheese, egg yolks, and some pasta water to create the sauce.

title: Prepare Guanciale
description: Cut guanciale into large chunks or matchsticks, ready for cooking. For guanciale: Remove the skin, slice, and chop it into chunks. Cook it in a cold pan to render the fat. For bacon: Slice or chop it into pieces and cook in a pan over medium heat until crispy, draining excess fat but leaving a small amount in the pan. Optionally, add cracked garlic and freshly cracked black pepper to the pan with the guanciale or bacon to infuse flavors.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare Guanciale
original_subgoals.description: Cut guanciale into large chunks or matchsticks, ready for cooking.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare guanciale
original_subgoals.description: Cut guanciale or pancetta into chunks for the sauce.

original_subgoals.title: Cook guanciale
original_subgoals.description: Cook guanciale in olive oil to start the sauce.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare Guanciale
original_subgoals.description: Remove the skin from the guanciale, slice it, and chop it into chunks. Begin cooking it in a cold pan to render the fat.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare Bacon
original_subgoals.description: Slice the bacon into thick pieces and cook it in a pan over medium heat to render out the fat and make it crispy.

original_subgoals.title: Render Bacon Fat
original_subgoals.description: Continue cooking the bacon until the fat is rendered and the bacon is crispy, then drain excess fat, leaving a small amount in the pan.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare bacon
original_subgoals.description: Chop the bacon into small pieces to prepare it for cooking.

original_subgoals.title: Cook bacon
original_subgoals.description: Cook the chopped bacon until it is crispy, then turn off the heat and let it cool slightly.

original_subgoals.title: Add Garlic and Pepper
original_subgoals.description: Add cracked garlic and freshly cracked black pepper to the pan with the guanciale to infuse flavors.

title: Cook Pasta
description: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking. Adjust the amount of salt based on the saltiness of other ingredients.

original_subgoals.title: Cook Pasta
original_subgoals.description: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking.

original_subgoals.title: Boil pasta
original_subgoals.description: Boil water, add salt, and cook pasta until done.

original_subgoals.title: Cook Pasta
original_subgoals.description: Cook the pasta in boiling water with a small amount of salt until it is al dente.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare Pasta Water
original_subgoals.description: Bring a pot of water to a boil and season it with salt, adjusting the amount based on the saltiness of other ingredients.

original_subgoals.title: Cook Spaghetti
original_subgoals.description: Cook the spaghetti in boiling water until slightly al dente, then transfer it to the pan with bacon fat.

original_subgoals.title: Cook spaghetti
original_subgoals.description: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until it is cooked al dente.

title: Cook Guanciale
description: Cook guanciale in a pan with a little olive oil until light golden brown, ensuring it retains some chewiness.

original_subgoals.title: Cook Guanciale
original_subgoals.description: Cook guanciale in a pan with a little olive oil until light golden brown, ensuring it retains some chewiness.

title: Combine Pasta and Meat
description: Add the cooked pasta and some pasta water to the pan with the guanciale or bacon, turning off the heat to stop frying and start emulsifying the sauce.

original_subgoals.title: Combine pasta and sauce
original_subgoals.description: Mix cooked pasta with guanciale and egg mixture to form the sauce.

original_subgoals.title: Combine Pasta and Guanciale
original_subgoals.description: Add the cooked pasta and some pasta water to the pan with the guanciale, turning off the heat to stop frying and start emulsifying the sauce.

title: Mix Pasta and Sauce
description: Combine cooked pasta with egg and cheese mixture, guanciale, and its fat, mixing thoroughly to emulsify the sauce. Add the egg and cheese mixture to the pasta and guanciale or bacon, tossing to create a creamy sauce through emulsification. Ensure the eggs cook gently to form a creamy sauce without scrambling. Add pasta water as needed to achieve a creamy consistency.

original_subgoals.title: Mix Pasta and Sauce
original_subgoals.description: Combine cooked pasta with egg and cheese mixture, guanciale, and its fat, mixing thoroughly to emulsify the sauce.

original_subgoals.title: Add Egg Mixture
original_subgoals.description: Add the egg and cheese mixture to the pasta and guanciale, tossing to create a creamy sauce through emulsification.

original_subgoals.title: Combine Ingredients
original_subgoals.description: Mix the cooked spaghetti with the egg and cheese mixture in the pan, ensuring the eggs cook gently to form a creamy sauce without scrambling.

original_subgoals.title: Combine pasta and sauce
original_subgoals.description: Mix the cooked spaghetti with the bacon and sauce, adding pasta water as needed to achieve a creamy consistency.

title: Serve Carbonara
description: Plate the carbonara, adding extra guanciale, pepper, and cheese on top before serving hot. Finish the dish with additional black pepper and pecorino cheese. Plate the pasta, garnish with additional cheese, crispy bacon or guanciale, and pepper, and serve immediately.

original_subgoals.title: Serve Carbonara
original_subgoals.description: Plate the carbonara, adding extra guanciale, pepper, and cheese on top before serving hot.

original_subgoals.title: Add final touches
original_subgoals.description: Add parmesan or pecorino and pepper to finish the dish.

original_subgoals.title: Finish and Serve
original_subgoals.description: Finish the dish with additional black pepper and pecorino cheese, and serve immediately.

original_subgoals.title: Plate and Garnish
original_subgoals.description: Plate the pasta, garnish with additional cheese and crispy bacon, and serve.

original_subgoals.title: Finish dish
original_subgoals.description: Add final touches such as additional cheese and pepper before serving.
